game.name: Blood Ties
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Warfare Studios (Ashes of Immortality, Shining Plume) is back with a new tale involving vampires and epic fights with this great RPG.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Warfare Studios (Ashes of Immortality, Shining Plume) is back with a new tale involving vampires and epic fights with this great RPG.
